original_text: And the hand of the Lord was there upon me; and he said unto me, Arise, go forth into the plain, and I will there talk with thee.
korean_text: 여호와께서 권능으로 거기서 내게 임하시고 또 내게 이르시되 일어나 들로 나아가라 내가 거기서 너와 말하리라 하시기로

sentences.original_text: And hand of the Lord was there upon me
Arise, go forth into the plain
and I will there talk with thee
